(ModalContext.java:113) Here is the class file (pay attention for the private class down there): package somepackage; import java.io.Serializable; import java.util.ArrayList; import java.util.Enumeration; import javax.swing.tree.TreeNode; /** * The node in Topic Tree which has the topic and all its children.
* * @author Igor
*/ public class TopicNode_RO implements TreeNode, Serializable { /** topic name */ protected String name; /** parent topic */ protected TopicNode_RO parent; /** list of branches (children) */ protected ArrayList branchList; /** * Default constructor. */ public TopicNode_RO() { this.branchList = new ArrayList(); } /** * Constructor with topic's name. * * @param name * name of the topic */ public TopicNode_RO(String name) { this(); this.name = name; } /** * number of children * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#getChildCount() */ public final int getChildCount() { if (branchList != null) return branchList.size(); else return 0; } /** * unlimited depth allowed as of now * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#getAllowsChildren() */ public final boolean getAllowsChildren() { return true; } /** * it is leaf if it has no children * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#isLeaf() */ public final boolean isLeaf() { return getChildCount() == 0; } /** * return children enumeration object * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#children() */ public final Enumeration children() { return new TopicNodeEnumeration(this); } /** * return parent topic * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#getParent() */ public final TreeNode getParent() { return parent; } /** * return child by its index * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#getChildAt(int) */ public final TreeNode getChildAt(final int index) { return (TreeNode) branchList.get(index); } /** * check if the object is inside * * @see javax.swing.tree.TreeNode#getIndex (javax.swing.tree.TreeNode) */ public final int getIndex(final TreeNode child) { return branchList.indexOf(child); } /** * Returns name for presentation (in the list). * * @see java.lang.Object#toString() */ public String toString() { return name; } } /** * Class for enumeration of children for certain topic.
* * @param * The type of topic which children are enumerated. * @author Igor */ class TopicNodeEnumeration implements Enumeration { /** position */ private int position = 0; /** a topic itself */ private T topic; /** * Constructor - saves reference to needed Topic object * * @param topic - * the object we will enumerate */ public TopicNodeEnumeration(final T topic) { this.topic = topic; } /** @see java.util.Enumeration#hasMoreElements() */ public final boolean hasMoreElements() { return this.position < this.topic.getChildCount(); } /** @see java.util.Enumeration#nextElement() */ public final TreeNode nextElement() { return this.topic.getChildAt(this.position++); } }
